home.title: Welcome
home.greeting:
Foremost I would like to thank you for visiting my site, which is in fact my résumé. 
I am a graduate of IT related studies (class '13), I have a master in Management ('15) and in November '17 I decided to change my occupation by picking up programming, with front-end or full-stack in mind, the result of which you can see on this site.
	I live in Poznań, Poland and I am currently looking for a job in the Industry, where I will be able to improve my skills and get aided in my programming endeavors. I am highly communicative. Most of my life I worked with people by supporting marketing events and fair exhibitions. Finishing Business Communication, IT and Econometry studies made me a mix of different worlds. If you are looking for a person, who in a long run, can be a bridge between departments or who can fit in diverse roles I might be the one for the job.

	If you would like to contact me or leave some feedback you can use the contact form.
I will highly appreciate that.

Also I wish you a marvelous day :)

Best regards

contact.main: If you are interested you can reach me via the form below or social links

contact.msgSent: Thank you for your interest. I will reach back to you as soon as I can
